description: Many of Europe's ski slopes will be closed, but the Swiss and Austrians have made their own plans.
title: Coronavirus: Defiant ski nations bid to save winter season
title_page: Coronavirus: Defiant ski nations bid to save winter season - BBC News
maintext: Nightclubs have been closed for weeks - there may be skiing in Switzerland, but there is no apr¨¨s-ski. Masks are obligatory on lifts, even the open-air chairlifts. The resorts insist their safety concept is good, they have no intention of becoming a giant Ischgl - or Swisschgl, as one cynic here put it.
